membershipLevels.name: Non-Profit
membershipLevels.description: For NGOs, schools, and community organizations

membershipLevels.name: Bronze
benefits: Listing in the Chamber business directory
Access to basic advertising opportunities (small ad placements)

membershipLevels.name: Silver
benefits: Spotlight feature on Chamber’s website (rotating banner or homepage listing)
Priority invitations to business mixers & networking events
Ability to host a Chamber event once a year

membershipLevels.name: Gold
benefits: Premium advertising placement (homepage spotlight, newsletter features)
Exclusive invitations to high-level networking events with city leaders
Recognition as a Gold Sponsor at Chamber events
Option to lead a training or seminar for members
Priority placement in Chamber publications & social media highlights
